manifest.name: @vue/babel-sugar-v-on
manifest.description: Babel syntactic sugar for v-model support in Vue JSX

scripts.pretest:functional: yarn build:dependency && yarn build:test && nyc --reporter=html --reporter=text-summary babel test/functional.js --plugins ./dist/plugin.testing.js,../babel-plugin-transform-vue-jsx/dist/plugin.js,@babel/plugin-transform-arrow-functions --out-file test/functional-compiled.js
scripts.test: rm -rf coverage* && yarn test:snapshot && mv coverage coverage-snapshot && yarn test:functional && mv coverage coverage-functional
